channel.title: [508] Cooking + fishing Help [508]
channel.description: Hey everyone, so i just finished my fishing and cooking systems, they are complete, except for when the player clicks away or runs away from the cooking range/fishing spots, it continues to cook/fish. how can i make it so when the player clicks away or runs away from the spot, they stop fishing/cooking? any help is greatly appreciated! thank you!

item.title: [508] Cooking + fishing Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

Hey everyone, so i just finished my fishing and cooking systems, they are complete, except for when the player clicks away or runs away from the cooking range/fishing spots, it continues to cook/fish. how can i make it so when the player clicks away or runs away from the spot, they stop fishing/cooking? any help is greatly appreciated! thank you!
